Yet the main cause lay deeper still ; [she]335-margaret had outgrown stimulants , and was passing from words to things . It was doubtless a pity not to keep up with [Wedekind]509-wedekind or [John]314-jacky , but some closing of the gates is inevitable after thirty , if the mind itself is to become a creative power . [Margaret]335-margaret judged it better to settle the little trouble [herself]335-margaret . Parties were evidently ruffled . With [Henry]349-henry 's permission , [she]335-margaret wrote a pleasant note to [Miss Avery]451-miss avery , asking [her]451-miss avery to leave the cases untouched . Then , at the first convenient opportunity , [she]335-margaret went down [herself]335-margaret , intending to repack [her]335-margaret belongings and store them properly in [the local warehouse]2964-the local warehouse : the plan had been amateurish and a failure . [Tibby]250-tibby promised to accompany [her]335-margaret , but at the last moment begged to be excused . So , for the second time in [her]335-margaret life , [she]335-margaret entered [the house]558-the house alone . The day of [her]335-margaret visit was exquisite , and the last of unclouded happiness that [she]335-margaret was to have for many months . [Her]335-margaret anxiety about [Helen]245-helen 's extraordinary absence was still dormant , and as for a possible brush with [Miss Avery]451-miss avery — that only gave zest to the expedition . [She]335-margaret had also eluded [Dolly]336-dolly 's invitation to luncheon . Walking straight up from [the station]3708-the station , [she]335-margaret crossed [the village green]2967-the village green and entered [the long chestnut avenue]2968-the long chestnut avenue that connects [it]2967-the village green with [the church]4293-the church . [The church]4293-the church itself stood in [the village]3734-the village once . But [it]4293-the church there attracted [so many worshippers]2972-so many worshippers that [the devil]2973-the devil , in a pet , snatched it from its foundations , and poised it on [an inconvenient knoll]2974-an inconvenient knoll , three - quarters of a mile away . If this story is true , [the chestnut avenue]2975-the chestnut avenue must have been planted by [the angels]2976-the angels . No more tempting approach could be imagined for [the luke - warm Christian]2977-the luke - warm christian , and if [he]2977-the luke - warm christian still finds the walk too long , [the devil]2973-the devil is defeated all the same , [Science]512-science having built [Holy Trinity]228-holy trinity , [a Chapel of Ease]2979-a chapel of ease , near [the Charles ']2980-the charles ' , and roofed [it]228-holy trinity with tin . Up [the avenue]2981-the avenue [Margaret]335-margaret strolled slowly , stopping to watch the sky that gleamed through the upper branches of the chestnuts , or to finger the little horseshoes on the lower branches . Why has not [England]31-england a great mythology ? [Our]2982-our folklore has never advanced beyond daintiness , and the greater melodies about [[our]2982-our country - side]2983-our country - side have all issued through the pipes of [Greece]137-greece . Deep and true as the native imagination can be , it seems to have failed here . It has stopped with [the witches]2984-the witches and the fairies . It can not vivify one fraction of a summer field , or give names to half a dozen stars . [England]31-england still waits for the supreme moment of [her]31-england literature — for [the great poet who shall voice [her]31-england]2985-the great poet who shall voice her , or , better still , for [the thousand little poets whose voices shall pass into [our]2982-our common talk]2986-the thousand little poets whose voices shall pass into our common talk . At [the church]4293-the church the scenery changed . [The chestnut avenue]2975-the chestnut avenue opened into [a road]4499-a road , smooth but narrow , which led into [the untouched country]2990-the untouched country . [She]335-margaret followed [it]4499-a road for over a mile . Its little hesitations pleased [her]335-margaret . Having no urgent destiny , [it]4499-a road strolled downhill or up as it wished , taking no trouble about the gradients , nor about the view , which nevertheless expanded . [The great estates that throttle [the south of [Hertfordshire]67-hertfordshire]2992-the south of hertfordshire]2991-the great estates that throttle the south of hertfordshire were less obtrusive here , and the appearance of [the land]5059-the land was neither aristocratic nor suburban . To define it was difficult , but [Margaret]335-margaret knew what it was not : it was not snobbish . Though [its]4499-a road contours were slight , there was a touch of freedom in [their]4499-a road sweep to which [Surrey]78-surrey will never attain , and [the distant brow of [the Chilterns]229-the chilterns]2994-the distant brow of the chilterns towered like [a mountain]2995-a mountain . " Left to [itself]4499-a road , "[335-margaret] was [Margaret]335-margaret 's opinion , " [this county]5540-this county would vote Liberal . [Here]575-here had lived [an elder race]5553-an elder race , to which [we]5554-we look back with disquietude . [The country which [we]5554-we visit at week - ends]5555-the country which we visit at week - ends was really a home to it , and the graver sides of life , the deaths , the partings , the yearnings for love , have their deepest expression in the heart of [the fields]5556-the fields . All was not sadness . The sun was shining without . [The thrush]514-the thrush sang [his]514-the thrush two syllables on the budding guelder - rose . [Some children]5557-some children were playing uproariously in heaps of golden straw . It was the presence of sadness at all that surprised [Margaret]335-margaret , and ended by giving [her]335-margaret a feeling of completeness . In [these English farms]5558-these english farms , if anywhere , one might see life steadily and see it whole , group in one vision its transitoriness and its eternal youth , connect — connect without bitterness until all [men]597-men are [brothers]5560-brothers . But [her]335-margaret thoughts were interrupted by the return of [[Miss Avery]451-miss avery 's niece]3001-miss avery 's niece , and were so tranquillizing that [she]335-margaret suffered the interruption gladly . It was quicker to go out by the back door , and , after due explanations , [they]597-men went out by it . [The niece]5562-the niece was now mortified by unnumerable chickens , who rushed up to [her]5562-the niece feet for food , and by [a shameless and maternal sow]5563-a shameless and maternal sow . [She]5562-the niece did not know what animals were coming to . But [her]5562-the niece gentility withered at the touch of the sweet air . The wind was rising , scattering the straw and ruffling the tails of the ducks as they floated in families over [[Evie]253-evie 's pendant]5564-evie 's pendant . One of those delicious gales of spring , in which leaves stiff in bud seem to rustle , swept over [the land]5059-the land and then fell silent . "[249-charles] [I]0-i suppose so ; but [Ruth]335-margaret should have married a — no disrespect to [you]0-i to say this , for [I]0-i take it [you]0-i were intended to get [Wilcox]335-margaret any way , whether [she]335-margaret got [him]249-charles first or no . " "[0-i] Whom should [she]335-margaret have married ? " "[3060-a soldier] [A soldier]3060-a soldier ! " exclaimed [the old woman]1736-the old woman . "[3061-some real soldier] [Some real soldier]3061-some real soldier . " [Margaret]335-margaret was silent . It was a criticism of [Henry]349-henry 's character far more trenchant than any of [her]335-margaret own . [She]335-margaret felt dissatisfied . "[3061-some real soldier] But that 's all over , " [she]335-margaret went on . "[3061-some real soldier] A better time is coming now , though [you]0-i 've kept [me]0-i long enough waiting . " "[510-mrs. wilcox] Certainly , [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox , " said [Miss Avery]451-miss avery , and resigned [her]451-miss avery duties with a smile . Relieved at this conclusion , and having sent [her]335-margaret compliments to [Madge]246-margaret , [Margaret]246-margaret walked back to [the station]3708-the station . [She]246-margaret had intended to go to [the furniture warehouse]5618-the furniture warehouse and give directions for removal , but the muddle had turned out more extensive than [she]246-margaret expected , so [she]246-margaret decided to consult [Henry]349-henry . It was as well that [she]246-margaret did this . [He]349-henry was strongly against employing [the local man whom [he]349-henry had previously recommended]5619-the local man whom he had previously recommended , and advised [her]246-margaret to store in [London]2-london after all . But before this could be done an unexpected trouble fell upon [her]246-margaret . It was not unexpected entirely . [Aunt Juley]255-aunt juley 's health had been bad all the winter . [She]255-aunt juley had had a long series of colds and coughs , and had been too busy to get rid of them . [She]255-aunt juley had scarcely promised [[her]255-aunt juley niece]680-her niece "[510-mrs. wilcox] to really take [my]0-i tiresome chest in hand , " when [she]255-aunt juley caught a chill and developed acute pneumonia . [Margaret]246-margaret and [Tibby]250-tibby went down to [Swanage]10-swanage . [Helen]245-helen was telegraphed for , and that spring party that after all gathered in [that hospitable house]5621-that hospitable house had all the pathos of fair memories . On a perfect day , when the sky seemed blue porcelain , and the waves of [the discreet little bay]5622-the discreet little bay beat gentlest of tattoos upon the sand , [Margaret]246-margaret hurried up through the rhododendrons , confronted again by the senselessness of Death . One death may explain itself , but it throws no light upon another : the groping inquiry must begin anew . [Preachers]5623-preachers or [scientists]5624-scientists may generalize , but [we]5625-we know that no generality is possible about [those whom [we]5625-we love]5626-those whom we love ; not one heaven awaits [them]5626-those whom we love , not even one oblivion . [Aunt Juley]255-aunt juley , incapable of tragedy , slipped out of life with odd little laughs and apologies for having stopped in it so long . [She]255-aunt juley was very weak ; [she]255-aunt juley could not rise to the occasion , or realize the great mystery which all agree must await [her]255-aunt juley ; it only seemed to [her]255-aunt juley that [she]255-aunt juley was quite done up — more done up than ever before ; that [she]255-aunt juley saw and heard and felt less every moment ; and that , unless something changed , [she]255-aunt juley would soon feel nothing . [Her]246-margaret spare strength [she]246-margaret devoted to plans : could not [Margaret]246-margaret take some steamer expeditions ? were [mackerel]518-mackerel cooked as [Tibby]250-tibby liked them ? [She]246-margaret worried [herself]246-margaret about [Helen]245-helen 's absence , and also that [she]246-margaret could be the cause of [Helen]245-helen 's return . [The nurses]5627-the nurses seemed to think such interests quite natural , and perhaps [hers]246-margaret was an average approach to [the Great Gate]233-the great gate . But [Margaret]246-margaret saw [Death]491-death stripped of any false romance ; whatever the idea of Death may contain , the process can be trivial and hideous . " That was the stock criticism about [Helen]245-helen , but [Margaret]246-margaret 's voice trembled as [she]246-margaret made it . By now [she]246-margaret was deeply pained at [[her]246-margaret sister]545-her sister 's behaviour . It may be unbalanced to fly out of [England]31-england , but to stop away eight months argues that the heart is awry as well as the head . [A sick - bed]5629-a sick - bed could recall [Helen]245-helen , but [she]245-helen was deaf to more human calls ; after a glimpse at [[her]245-helen aunt]613-her aunt , [she]245-helen would retire into [her]245-helen nebulous life behind some poste restante . [She]245-helen scarcely existed ; [her]245-helen letters had become dull and infrequent ; [she]245-helen had no wants and no curiosity . And it was all put down to [poor Henry]349-henry 's account ! [Henry]349-henry , long pardoned by [[his]349-henry wife]4328-his wife , was still too infamous to be greeted by [[his]349-henry sister - in - law]2425-his sister - in - law . It was morbid , and , to [her]246-margaret alarm , [Margaret]246-margaret fancied that [she]246-margaret could trace the growth of morbidity back in [Helen]245-helen 's life for nearly four years . The flight from [Oniton]246-margaret ; the unbalanced patronage of [the Basts]394-the basts ; the explosion of grief up on [the Downs]234-the downs — all connected with [Paul]247-paul , [an insignificant boy whose lips had kissed [hers]246-margaret for a fraction of time]5633-an insignificant boy whose lips had kissed hers for a fraction of time . [Margaret]246-margaret and [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox had feared that [they]5634-they might kiss again . Foolishly : the real danger was reaction . Reaction against [the Wilcoxes]251-the wilcoxes had eaten into [her]246-margaret life until [she]246-margaret was scarcely sane . At twenty - five [she]246-margaret had an idée fixe . What hope was there for [her]246-margaret as [an old woman]2372-an old woman ? The more [Margaret]246-margaret thought about it the more alarmed [she]246-margaret became . For many months [she]246-margaret had put the subject away , but it was too big to be slighted now . There was almost a taint of madness . Were all [Helen]245-helen 's actions to be governed by a tiny mishap , such as may happen to [any young man]5636-any young man or [woman]4329-woman ? Can human nature be constructed on lines so insignificant ? The blundering little encounter at [Howards End]339-margaret was vital . It propagated itself where graver intercourse lay barren ; it was stronger than sisterly intimacy , stronger than reason or books . In one of [her]245-helen moods [Helen]245-helen had confessed that [she]245-helen still "[245-helen] enjoyed " it in a certain sense . [Paul]247-paul had faded , but the magic of [his]247-paul caress endured . And where there is enjoyment of the past there may also be reaction — propagation at both ends . Well , it is odd and sad that [our]5638-our minds should be such seed - beds , and [we]5638-our without power to choose the seed . But [man]3767-man is [an odd , sad creature as yet]5640-an odd , sad creature as yet , intent on pilfering [the earth]4343-the earth , and heedless of the growths within [himself]3767-man . [He]3767-man can not be bored about psychology . [Margaret]246-margaret and [Helen]245-helen have been more patient , and it is suggested that [Margaret]246-margaret has succeeded — so far as success is yet possible . Whether [Helen]245-helen has succeeded [one]559-one can not say . The day that [Mrs. Munt]258-mrs. munt rallied [Helen]245-helen 's letter arrived . [She]258-mrs. munt had posted it at [Munich]215-munich , and would be in [London]2-london [herself]258-mrs. munt on the morrow . It was a disquieting letter , though the opening was affectionate and sane . [Dearest Meg]246-margaret , Give [Helen]245-helen 's love to [Aunt Juley]255-aunt juley . [She]246-margaret replied that [[their]5647-our aunt]685-their aunt was much better , and awaited developments . [Tibby]250-tibby approved of [her]246-margaret reply . Mellowing rapidly , [he]250-tibby was [a pleasanter companion than before]5650-a pleasanter companion than before . [Oxford]88-oxford had done much for [him]250-tibby . But [he]250-tibby had not grown more human . The years between eighteen and twenty - two , so magical for most , were leading [him]250-tibby gently from boyhood to middle age . [He]250-tibby had never known young - manliness , that quality which warms the heart till death , and gives [Mr. Wilcox]249-charles an imperishable charm . [He]250-tibby was frigid , through no fault of [his]250-tibby own , and without cruelty . "[0-i] [I]0-i was meaning that when [she]245-helen was eccentric in the past , [one]559-one could trace it back to the heart in the long run . " [Henry]349-henry began to grow serious . Ill - health was to [him]349-henry something perfectly definite . Generally well [himself]349-henry , [he]349-henry could not realize that [we]3082-us sink to it by slow gradations . [The sick]5670-the sick had no rights ; [they]5670-the sick were outside the pale ; [one]559-one could lie to [them]5670-the sick remorselessly . When [[his]349-henry first wife]5672-his first wife was seized , [he]349-henry had promised to take [her]3086-her down into [Hertfordshire]67-hertfordshire , but meanwhile arranged with [a nursing - home]5673-a nursing - home instead . [Helen]245-helen , too , was ill . And the plan that [he]349-henry sketched out for [her]245-helen capture , clever and well - meaning as it was , drew its ethics from the wolf - pack . Then [she]246-margaret passed out into what was now the evening . [Charles]510-mrs. wilcox and [Tibby]250-tibby met at [Ducie Street]124-ducie street , where [the latter]3247-the latter was staying . [Their]3248-their interview was short and absurd . [They]3248-their had nothing in common but the English language , and tried by its help to express what [neither of [them]3248-their]3249-neither of them understood . [Charles]510-mrs. wilcox saw in [Helen]245-helen [the family foe]3250-the family foe . [His]349-henry mind was made up at once : [the girl]3912-the girl must be got out of the way before [she]245-helen disgraced [them]3248-their farther . But this was a concession to morality , it formed no part of [his]349-henry main scheme . Honest and hearty was [Charles]510-mrs. wilcox 's dislike , and the past spread itself out very clearly before [him]349-henry ; hatred is [a skilful compositor]3256-a skilful compositor . [Tibby]250-tibby , on the other hand , had no opinions . [He]250-tibby stood above the conventions : [[his]250-tibby sister]4364-his sister had a right to do what [she]4364-his sister thought right . [His]250-tibby was the leisure without sympathy — an attitude as fatal as the strenuous : a little cold culture may be raised on it , but no art . [[His]250-tibby sisters]1468-his sisters had seen [the family]4082-the family danger , and had never forgotten to discount the gold islets that raised [them]1468-his sisters from [the sea]3847-the sea . [Leonard]308-leonard — [he]308-leonard would figure at length in a newspaper report , but that evening [he]308-leonard did not count for much . The foot of the tree was in shadow , since the moon was still hidden behind [the house]558-the house . But above , to right , to left , down [the long meadow]3281-the long meadow the moonlight was streaming . [Leonard]308-leonard seemed not [a man]3695-a man , but [a cause]3283-a cause . Perhaps it was [Helen]245-helen 's way of falling in love — a curious way to [Margaret]246-margaret , whose agony and whose contempt of [Henry]349-henry were yet imprinted with [his]349-henry image . [Helen]245-helen forgot [people]3797-people . [They]3797-people were husks that had enclosed [her]245-helen emotion . [She]245-helen could pity , or sacrifice [herself]245-helen , or have instincts , but had [she]245-helen ever loved in the noblest way , where [man]3767-man and [woman]4329-woman , having lost [themselves]3287-themselves in sex , desire to lose sex itself in comradeship ? [Margaret]246-margaret wondered , but said no word of blame . This was [Helen]245-helen 's evening . Troubles enough lay ahead of [her]245-helen — the loss of [friends]592-friends and of social advantages , the agony , the supreme agony , of motherhood , which is even yet not a matter of common knowledge . For the present let the moon shine brightly and the breezes of the spring blow gently , dying away from the gale of the day , and let [the earth]4343-the earth , who brings increase , bring peace . Not even to [herself]246-margaret dare [she]246-margaret blame [Helen]245-helen . [She]246-margaret could not assess [her]245-helen trespass by any moral code ; it was everything or nothing . Morality can tell [us]3290-us that murder is worse than stealing , and group most sins in an order [all]3291-all must approve , but it can not group [Helen]245-helen . The surer its pronouncements on this point , the surer may [we]3290-us be that morality is not speaking . [Christ]532-christ was evasive when [they]3292-they questioned [Him]532-christ . "[246-margaret] " Still , no more plans now . And no more reminiscences . "[3299-they] [They]3299-they were silent for a little . It was [Helen]245-helen 's evening . The present flowed by [them]3299-they like a stream . The tree rustled . It had made music before [they]3299-they were born , and would continue after [their]3299-they deaths , but its song was of the moment . The moment had passed . The tree rustled again . [Their]3299-they senses were sharpened , and [they]3299-they seemed to apprehend life . Life passed . The tree nestled again . " Sleep now , "[246-margaret] said [Margaret]246-margaret . The peace of [the country]1115-the country was entering into [her]246-margaret . [It]3301-it has no commerce with memory , and little with hope . Least of all is it concerned with the hopes of the next five minutes . It is the peace of the present , which passes understanding . Its murmur came " now , "[3301-it] and " now "[3301-it] once more as [they]3299-they trod the gravel , and " now , "[3301-it] as the moonlight fell upon [[their]3299-they father]3823-their father 's sword . [They]3299-they passed [upstairs]3701-upstairs , kissed , and amidst the endless iterations fell asleep . [The house]558-the house had enshadowed the tree at first , but as the moon rose higher the two disentangled , and were clear for a few moments at midnight . [Margaret]246-margaret awoke and looked into [the garden]562-the garden . How incomprehensible that [Leonard Bast]308-leonard should have won [her]246-margaret this night of peace ! Was [he]308-leonard also part of [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox 's mind ? Far different was [Leonard]308-leonard 's development . The months after Oniton , whatever minor troubles [they]3306-they might bring [him]308-leonard , were all overshadowed by Remorse . When [Helen]245-helen looked back [she]245-helen could philosophize , or [she]245-helen could look into the future and plan for [[her]245-helen child]3307-her child . But [the father]3661-the father saw nothing beyond [his]3661-the father own sin . Weeks afterwards , in the midst of other occupations , [he]3661-the father would suddenly cry out , " [Brute]533-brute — [[you]533-brute brute]5922-you brute , [I]3661-the father could n't have — "[3661-the father] and be rent into [two people who held dialogues]3309-two people who held dialogues . Or brown rain would descend , blotting out faces and the sky . Even [Jacky]314-jacky noticed the change in [him]308-leonard . Most terrible were [his]308-leonard sufferings when [he]308-leonard awoke from sleep . Sometimes [he]308-leonard was happy at first , but grew conscious of a burden hanging to [him]308-leonard and weighing down [his]308-leonard thoughts when they would move . Or little irons scorched [his]308-leonard body . Or a sword stabbed [him]308-leonard . [He]308-leonard would sit at the edge of [his]308-leonard bed , holding [his]308-leonard heart and moaning , " Oh what shall [I]308-leonard do , whatever shall [I]308-leonard do ? "[308-leonard] Nothing brought ease . [He]308-leonard could put distance between [him]308-leonard and the trespass , but it grew in [his]308-leonard soul . Remorse is not among the eternal verities . [The Greeks]370-the greeks were right to dethrone [her]3310-her . [Her]3310-her action is too capricious , as though [the Erinyes]534-the erinyes selected for punishment only [certain men]3311-certain men and certain sins . And of all means to regeneration Remorse is surely the most wasteful . It cuts away healthy tissues with the poisoned . It is a knife that probes far deeper than the evil . [Leonard]308-leonard was driven straight through its torments and emerged pure , but enfeebled — [a better man]5414-a better man , who would never lose control of [himself]308-leonard again , but also a smaller , who had less to control . Nor did purity mean peace . The use of the knife can become a habit as hard to shake off as passion itself , and [Leonard]308-leonard continued to start with a cry out of dreams . [He]308-leonard built up a situation that was far enough from the truth . It never occurred to [him]308-leonard that [Helen]245-helen was to blame . [He]308-leonard forgot the intensity of [their]3313-their talk , the charm that had been lent [him]308-leonard by sincerity , the magic of Oniton under darkness and of [the whispering river]3314-the whispering river . [Helen]245-helen loved the absolute . [Leonard]308-leonard had been ruined absolutely , and had appeared to [her]245-helen as [a man]3695-a man apart , isolated from [the world]805-the world . [A real man , who cared for adventure and beauty]3317-a real man , who cared for adventure and beauty , who desired to live decently and pay [his]308-leonard way , who could have travelled more gloriously through life than [the Juggernaut car that was crushing [him]308-leonard]3318-the juggernaut car that was crushing him . Memories of [Evie]253-evie 's wedding had warped [her]245-helen , [the starched servants]3319-the starched servants , the yards of uneaten food , the rustle of [overdressed women]3320-overdressed women , [motor - cars oozing grease on the gravel]3321-motor - cars oozing grease on the gravel , rubbish on a pretentious band . [She]245-helen had tasted the lees of this on [her]245-helen arrival : in the darkness , after failure , [they]3322-they intoxicated [her]245-helen . [She]245-helen and [the victim]3323-the victim seemed alone in a world of unreality , and [she]245-helen loved [him]3323-the victim absolutely , perhaps for half an hour . In the morning [she]245-helen was gone . The note that [she]245-helen left , tender and hysterical in tone , and intended to be most kind , hurt [[her]245-helen lover]4618-her lover terribly . It was as if some work of art had been broken by [him]3323-the victim , some picture in [the National Gallery]4535-the national gallery slashed out of its frame . When [he]3323-the victim recalled [her]245-helen talents and [her]245-helen social position , [he]3323-the victim felt that [the first passerby]3326-the first passerby had a right to shoot [him]3323-the victim down . [He]3323-the victim was afraid of [the waitress]5383-the waitress and [the porters at [the railway - station]3329-the railway - station]3328-the porters at the railway - station . [He]3323-the victim was afraid at first of [[his]3323-the victim wife]4328-his wife , though later [he]3323-the victim was to regard [her]4328-his wife with a strange new tenderness , and to think , " There is nothing to choose between [us]3331-us , after all . "[3323-the victim] The expedition to [Shropshire]126-shropshire crippled [the Basts]394-the basts permanently . [Helen]245-helen in [her]245-helen flight forgot to settle the hotel bill , and took [their]3331-us return tickets away with [her]245-helen ; [they]3331-us had to pawn [Jacky]314-jacky 's bangles to get [home]3928-home , and the smash came a few days afterwards . It is true that [Helen]245-helen offered [him]3323-the victim five thousands pounds , but such a sum meant nothing to [him]3323-the victim . [He]3323-the victim could not see that [the girl]3912-the girl was desperately righting [herself]3912-the girl , and trying to save something out of the disaster , if it was only five thousand pounds . But [he]3323-the victim had to live somehow . [He]3323-the victim turned to [[his]3323-the victim family]3839-his family , and degraded [himself]3323-the victim to [a professional beggar]3335-a professional beggar . There was nothing else for [him]3323-the victim to do . " A letter from [Leonard]308-leonard , "[535-blanche] thought [Blanche]535-blanche , [[his]3323-the victim sister]4364-his sister ; " and after all this time . " A letter from [Leonard]308-leonard ! "[3339-the other sister] said [the other sister]3339-the other sister , [Laura]536-laura , a few days later . [He]3323-the victim wrote a cruel insolent reply , but sent more money than [Blanche]535-blanche , so [Leonard]308-leonard soon wrote to [him]4099-her husband again . And during the winter the system was developed . [Leonard]308-leonard realized that [they]3341-they need never starve , because it would be too painful for [[his]308-leonard relatives]3342-his relatives . Society is based on [the family]4082-the family , and [the clever wastrel]3344-the clever wastrel can exploit this indefinitely . Without a generous thought on either side , pounds and pounds passed . [The donors]3345-the donors disliked [Leonard]308-leonard , and [he]308-leonard grew to hate [them]3345-the donors intensely . When [Laura]536-laura censured [his]308-leonard immoral marriage , [he]308-leonard thought bitterly , " [She]536-laura minds that ! What would [she]536-laura say if [she]536-laura knew the truth ? "[536-laura] When [[Blanche]535-blanche 's husband]3346-blanche 's husband offered [him]308-leonard work , [he]308-leonard found some pretext for avoiding it . [He]308-leonard had wanted work keenly at [Oniton]246-margaret , but too much anxiety had shattered [him]308-leonard ; [he]308-leonard was joining the unemployable . When [[his]308-leonard brother]814-his brother , [the lay - reader]994-the lay - reader , did not reply to a letter , [he]814-his brother wrote again , saying that [he]814-his brother and [Jacky]314-jacky would come down to [[his]814-his brother village]3349-his village on foot . [He]814-his brother did not intend this as blackmail . Still , [the brother]1036-the brother sent a postal order , and it became part of the system . And so passed [his]308-leonard winter and [his]308-leonard spring . In the horror there are two bright spots . [He]308-leonard never confused the past . [He]308-leonard remained alive , and blessed are [those who live , if it is only to a sense of sinfulness]3351-those who live , if it is only to a sense of sinfulness . The anodyne of muddledom , by which [most men]1914-most men blur and blend [their]1914-most men mistakes , never passed [Leonard]308-leonard 's lips — It is a hard saying , and [a hard man]3353-a hard man wrote it , but it lies at the foot of all character . And the other bright spot was [his]308-leonard tenderness for [Jacky]314-jacky . [He]308-leonard pitied [her]3354-her with nobility now — not the contemptuous pity of [a man who sticks to [a woman]1002-a woman through thick and thin]3355-a man who sticks to a woman through thick and thin . [He]308-leonard tried to be less irritable . [He]308-leonard wondered what [her]3354-her hungry eyes desired — nothing that [she]3354-her could express , or that [he]308-leonard or [any man]4868-any man could give [her]3354-her . Would [she]3354-her ever receive the justice that is mercy — the justice for by - products that [the world]805-the world is too busy to bestow ? [She]3354-her was fond of flowers , generous with money , and not revengeful . If [she]3354-her had borne [him]308-leonard [a child]3175-a child [he]308-leonard might have cared for [her]3354-her . [Unmarried]537-unmarried , [Leonard]308-leonard would never have begged ; [he]308-leonard would have flickered out and died . But the whole of life is mixed . [He]308-leonard had to provide for [Jacky]314-jacky , and went down [dirty paths]3360-dirty paths that [she]3354-her might have a few feathers and dishes of food that suited [her]3354-her . One day [he]308-leonard caught sight of [Margaret]246-margaret and [[her]246-margaret brother]3702-her brother . [He]308-leonard was in [[St. Paul]133-st. paul 's 's]3362-st. paul 's . [He]308-leonard had entered [the cathedral]3672-the cathedral partly to avoid the rain and partly to see a picture that had educated [him]308-leonard in former years . But the light was bad , the picture ill placed , and Time and [Judgment]538-judgment were inside [him]308-leonard now . [Death]491-death alone still charmed [him]308-leonard , with [her]246-margaret lap of poppies , on which [all men]4020-all men shall sleep . [He]308-leonard took one glance , and turned aimlessly away towards a chair . Then down [the nave]3365-the nave [he]308-leonard saw [Miss Schlegel]245-helen and [[her]246-margaret brother]3702-her brother . [They]3367-they stood in the fairway of [passengers]3368-passengers , and [their]3367-they faces were extremely grave . [He]308-leonard was perfectly certain that [they]3367-they were in trouble about [[their]3367-they sister]5090-their sister . Once outside — and [he]308-leonard fled immediately — [he]308-leonard wished that [he]308-leonard had spoken to [them]3367-they . What was [his]308-leonard life ? What were a few angry words , or even imprisonment ? [He]308-leonard had done wrong — that was the true terror . Whatever [they]3367-they might know , [he]308-leonard would tell [them]3367-they everything [he]308-leonard knew . [He]308-leonard re - entered [St. Paul 's]133-st. paul 's . But [they]3367-they had moved in [his]308-leonard absence , and had gone to lay [their]3367-they difficulties before [Mr. Wilcox]249-charles and [Charles]249-charles . The sight of [Margaret]246-margaret turned remorse into new channels . [He]308-leonard desired to confess , and though the desire is proof of a weakened nature , which is about to lose the essence of human intercourse , it did not take an ignoble form . [He]308-leonard did not suppose that confession would bring [him]308-leonard happiness . It was rather that [he]308-leonard yearned to get clear of [the tangle]3370-the tangle . So does the suicide yearn . The impulses are akin , and the crime of suicide lies rather in its disregard for the feelings of [those whom [we]3372-we leave behind]3371-those whom we leave behind . [Confession]539-confession need harm [no one]693-no one — it can satisfy that test — and though it was un - English , and ignored by [[our]3372-we Anglican cathedral]3374-our anglican cathedral , [Leonard]308-leonard had a right to decide upon it . Moreover , [he]308-leonard trusted [Margaret]246-margaret . [He]308-leonard wanted [her]246-margaret hardness now . That cold , intellectual nature of hers would be just , if unkind . [He]308-leonard would do whatever [she]246-margaret told [him]308-leonard , even if [he]308-leonard had to see [Helen]245-helen . That was the supreme punishment [she]246-margaret would exact . And perhaps [she]246-margaret would tell [him]308-leonard how [Helen]245-helen was . That was the supreme reward . [He]308-leonard knew nothing about [Margaret]246-margaret , not even whether [she]246-margaret was married to [Mr. Wilcox]249-charles , and tracking [her]246-margaret out took several days . That evening [he]308-leonard toiled through the wet to [Wickham Place]9-wickham place , where [the new flats]3375-the new flats were now appearing . Was [he]308-leonard also the cause of [their]3376-their move ? Were [they]3376-their expelled from [society]5870-society on [his]308-leonard account ? Thence to [a public library]3378-a public library , but could find no satisfactory [Schlegel]245-helen in the directory . On the morrow [he]308-leonard searched again . [He]308-leonard hung about outside [[Mr. Wilcox]249-charles 's office]3379-mr. wilcox 's office at lunch time , and , as [the clerks]3380-the clerks came out said : " Excuse [me]3380-the clerks , [sir]3748-sir , but is [[your]3748-sir boss]5924-your boss married ? "[3380-the clerks] [Most of [them]3380-the clerks]1242-most of them stared , [some]1422-some said , " What 's that to [you]3748-sir ? "[1422-some] but one , who had not yet acquired reticence , told [him]308-leonard what [he]308-leonard wished . [Leonard]308-leonard could not learn the private address . That necessitated more trouble with directories and [tubes]3383-tubes . [Ducie Street]124-ducie street was not discovered till the Monday , the day that [Margaret]246-margaret and [[her]246-margaret husband]4099-her husband went down on [their]3385-their hunting expedition to [Howards End]339-margaret . [He]308-leonard called at about four o'clock . The weather had changed , and the sun shone gaily on the ornamental steps — black and white marble in triangles . [Leonard]308-leonard lowered [his]308-leonard eyes to them after ringing the bell . [He]308-leonard felt in curious health : doors seemed to be opening and shutting inside [his]308-leonard body , and [he]308-leonard had been obliged to steep sitting up in bed , with [his]308-leonard back propped against the wall . When [the parlourmaid]3386-the parlourmaid came [he]308-leonard could not see [her]246-margaret face ; the brown rain had descended suddenly . " Does [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox live [here]575-here ? "[308-leonard] [he]308-leonard asked . " [She]510-mrs. wilcox 's out , "[308-leonard] was the answer . "[246-margaret] [She]246-margaret shut [him]3391-he out , and went to attend to the telephone , which was ringing furiously . [He]3391-he loitered away another night of agony . Confession grew more difficult . As soon as possible [he]3391-he went to bed . [He]3391-he watched a patch of moonlight cross the floor of [[their]3392-their lodging]3393-their lodging , and , as sometimes happens when the mind is overtaxed , [he]3391-he fell asleep for the rest of [the room]1059-the room , but kept awake for the patch of moonlight . Horrible ! Then began one of those disintegrating dialogues . [Part of [him]3391-he]3395-part of him said : " Why horrible ? It 's ordinary light from [the room]1059-the room . "[3395-part of him] " But it moves . "[3395-part of him] " So does the moon . "[3395-part of him] " But it is a clenched fist . "[3395-part of him] " Why not ? "[3395-part of him] " But it is going to touch [me]3395-part of him . "[3395-part of him] " Let it . "[3395-part of him] And , seeming to gather motion , the patch ran up [his]3391-he blanket . Presently a blue snake appeared ; then another , parallel to it . " Is there life in [the moon]5936-the moon ? "[3395-part of him] " Of course . "[3395-part of him] " Smaller snakes ! "[308-leonard] said [Leonard]308-leonard indignantly and aloud . " What a notion ! "[308-leonard] By a rending effort of the will [he]3391-he woke the rest of [the room]1059-the room up . " [I]3397-her say , [Jacky]314-jacky , [I]3397-her 'm going out for a bit . "[3397-her] [She]3397-her was breathing regularly . The patch of light fell clear of the striped blanket , and began to cover the shawl that lay over [her]3397-her feet . Why had [he]3391-he been afraid ? [He]3391-he went to the window , and saw that the moon was descending through a clear sky . [He]3391-he saw [her]3397-her volcanoes , and the bright expanses that [a gracious error]3398-a gracious error has named [seas]3399-seas . [They]3399-seas paled , for the sun , who had lit them up , was coming to light [the earth]4343-the earth . [Sea of Serenity]3401-sea of serenity , [Sea of Tranquillity]3402-sea of tranquillity , Ocean of the Lunar Storms , merged into one lucent drop , itself to slip into the sempiternal dawn . And [he]3391-he had been afraid of the moon ! [He]3391-he dressed among the contending lights , and went through [his]3391-he money . It was running low again , but enough for a return ticket to [Hilton]29-hilton . As it clinked [Jacky]314-jacky opened [her]3397-her eyes . " [Hullo]424-hullo , [Len]308-leonard ! What ho , [Len]308-leonard ! "[3397-her] " What ho , [Jacky]314-jacky ! see [you]314-jacky again later . "[3397-her] [She]3397-her turned over and slept . [The house]558-the house was unlocked , [[their]3404-their landlord]3405-their landlord being [a salesman at [Convent Garden]240-convent garden]3406-a salesman at convent garden . [Leonard]308-leonard passed out and made [his]308-leonard way down to [the station]3708-the station . With the first jolt [he]308-leonard was in daylight ; [they]3404-their had left the gateways of [[King]350-king 's Cross]3410-king 's cross , and were under blue sky . [Tunnels]3411-tunnels followed , and after each the sky grew bluer , and from [the embankment at [Finsbury Park]241-finsbury park]3412-the embankment at finsbury park [he]308-leonard had [his]308-leonard first sight of the sun . [He]308-leonard dozed again . Over [Tewin Water]28-tewin water it was day . To the left fell the shadow of the embankment and [its]3412-the embankment at finsbury park arches ; to the right [Leonard]308-leonard saw up into [the Tewin Woods]242-the tewin woods and towards [the church]4293-the church , with [its]4293-the church wild legend of immortality . Six forest trees — that is a fact — grow out of one of [the graves in [Tewin churchyard]3416-tewin churchyard]3415-the graves in tewin churchyard . [The grave 's occupant]3417-the grave 's occupant — that is the legend — is [an atheist]3418-an atheist , who declared that if [God]281-god existed , six forest trees would grow out of [[her]3418-an atheist grave]3419-her grave . These things in [Hertfordshire]67-hertfordshire ; and farther afield lay [the house of [a hermit]601-a hermit]3420-the house of a hermit — [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox had known [him]601-a hermit — who barred [himself]601-a hermit up , and wrote prophecies , and gave all [he]601-a hermit had to [the poor]3941-the poor . While , powdered in between , were the villas of [business men , who saw life more steadily , though with the steadiness of the half - closed eye]3423-business men , who saw life more steadily , though with the steadiness of the half - closed eye . Over all the sun was streaming , to all the birds were singing , to all the primroses were yellow , and the speedwell blue , and [the country]1115-the country , however [they]3425-they interpreted [her]3418-an atheist , was uttering [her]3418-an atheist cry of " now . "[3418-an atheist] [She]3418-an atheist did not free [Leonard]308-leonard yet , and the knife plunged deeper into [his]308-leonard heart as [the train]3670-the train drew up at [Hilton]29-hilton . But remorse had become beautiful . [Hilton]29-hilton was asleep , or at the earliest , breakfasting . [Leonard]308-leonard noticed the contrast when [he]308-leonard stepped out of it into [the country]1115-the country . [Here]575-here [men]597-men had been up since dawn . [Their]597-men hours were ruled , not by [a [London]2-london office]3430-a london office , but by the movements of the crops and the sun . That [they]597-men were [men of the finest type only [the sentimentalist]3432-the sentimentalist can declare]3431-men of the finest type only the sentimentalist can declare . But [they]597-men kept to the life of daylight . [They]597-men are [England]31-england 's hope . Clumsily [they]597-men carry forward the torch of the sun , until such time as [the nation]3433-the nation sees fit to take it up . [Half clodhopper]3434-half clodhopper , [half board - school prig]3435-half board - school prig , [they]597-men can still throw back to [a nobler stock]3436-a nobler stock , and [breed yeomen]3437-breed yeomen . At the chalk pit a motor passed [him]308-leonard . In it was another type , whom [Nature]344-nature favours — [the Imperial]3438-the imperial . Healthy , ever in motion , it hopes to inherit [the earth]4343-the earth . [It]3438-the imperial breeds as quickly as [the yeoman , and as soundly]3440-the yeoman , and as soundly ; strong is the temptation to acclaim [it]3438-the imperial as [a super - yeoman , who carries [[his]3441-a super - yeoman , who carries his country 's virtue overseas country]3442-his country 's virtue overseas]3441-a super - yeoman , who carries his country 's virtue overseas . But [the Imperialist]3443-the imperialist is not what [he]308-leonard thinks or seems . [He]3443-the imperialist is [a destroyer]3444-a destroyer . [He]3443-the imperialist prepares the way for cosmopolitanism , and though [his]3443-the imperialist ambitions may be fulfilled , [the earth]4343-the earth that [he]3443-the imperialist inherits will be grey . To [Leonard]308-leonard , intent on [his]308-leonard private sin , there came the conviction of innate goodness elsewhere . It was not the optimism which [he]308-leonard had been taught at [school]3446-school . Again and again must the drums tap , and [the goblins]858-the goblins stalk over [the universe]3903-the universe before joy can be purged of the superficial . It was rather paradoxical , and arose from [his]308-leonard sorrow . Death destroys [a man]3695-a man , but the idea of death saves [him]3695-a man — that is the best account of it that has yet been given . [Squalor]540-squalor and tragedy can beckon to all that is great in [us]3450-us , and strengthen the wings of love . [They]3451-they can beckon ; it is not certain that [they]3451-they will , for [they]3451-they are not [love 's servants]3452-love 's servants . But [they]3451-they can beckon , and the knowledge of this incredible truth comforted [him]308-leonard . As [he]308-leonard approached [the house]558-the house all thought stopped . Contradictory notions stood side by side in [his]308-leonard mind . [He]308-leonard was terrified but happy , ashamed , but had done no sin . [He]308-leonard knew the confession : " [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox , [I]308-leonard have done wrong , "[308-leonard] but sunrise had robbed its meaning , and [he]308-leonard felt rather on a supreme adventure . " [I]249-charles expected that , "[249-charles] said [Charles]249-charles . " [I]249-charles shall naturally be [the most important witness there]5987-the most important witness there . "[249-charles] Out of the turmoil and horror that had begun with [Aunt Juley]255-aunt juley 's illness and was not even to end with [Leonard]308-leonard 's death , it seemed impossible to [Margaret]246-margaret that healthy life should re - emerge . Events succeeded in a logical , yet senseless , train . [People]3797-people lost [their]3797-people humanity , and took values as arbitrary as those in a pack of playing - cards . It was natural that [Henry]349-henry should do this and cause [Helen]245-helen to do that , and then think [her]245-helen wrong for doing it ; natural that [she]245-helen [herself]245-helen should think [him]349-henry wrong ; natural that [Leonard]308-leonard should want to know how [Helen]245-helen was , and come , and [Charles]249-charles be angry with [him]308-leonard for coming — natural , but unreal . In this jangle of causes and effects what had become of [[their]3505-their true selves]3506-their true selves ? Here [Leonard]308-leonard lay dead in [the garden]562-the garden , from natural causes ; yet life was [a deep , deep river]3508-a deep , deep river , death a blue sky , life was [a house]3712-a house , death a wisp of hay , a flower , [a tower]3510-a tower , life and death were anything and everything , except this ordered insanity , where [the king]3511-the king takes [the queen]996-the queen , and [the ace]3513-the ace [the king]3511-the king . Ah , no ; there was beauty and adventure behind , such as [the man at [her]245-helen feet had yearned for]3515-the man at her feet had yearned for ; there was hope this side of the grave ; there were truer relationships beyond the limits that fetter [us]3516-us now . As [a prisoner]3517-a prisoner looks up and sees stars beckoning , so [she]3517-a prisoner , from the turmoil and horror of those days , caught glimpses of the diviner wheels . And [Helen]245-helen , dumb with fright , but trying to keep calm for [the child]4924-the child 's sake , and [Miss Avery]451-miss avery , calm , but murmuring tenderly , " [No one]693-no one ever told [the lad]5989-the lad [he]5989-the lad 'll have [a child"—they]5990-a child"—they[451-miss avery] also reminded [her]245-helen that horror is not the end . To what ultimate harmony [we]3516-us tend [she]245-helen did not know , but there seemed great chance that [a child]3175-a child would be born into [the world]805-the world , to take the great chances of beauty and adventure that [the world]805-the world offers . [She]245-helen moved through [the sunlit garden]3522-the sunlit garden , gathering narcissi , crimson - eyed and white . There was nothing else to be done ; the time for telegrams and anger was over , and it seemed wisest that the hands of [Leonard]308-leonard should be folded on [his]308-leonard breast and be filled with flowers . Here was [the father]3661-the father ; leave it at that . Let [Squalor]540-squalor be turned into [Tragedy , whose eyes are the stars , and whose hands hold the sunset and the dawn]3524-tragedy , whose eyes are the stars , and whose hands hold the sunset and the dawn . And even the influx of [officials]3525-officials , even the return of [the doctor , vulgar and acute]3526-the doctor , vulgar and acute , could not shake [her]245-helen belief in the eternity of beauty . Science explained [people]3797-people , but could not understand [them]3797-people . After long centuries among the bones and muscles it might be advancing to knowledge of the nerves , but this would never give understanding . One could open the heart to [Mr. Mansbridge]523-mr. mansbridge and [[his]523-mr. mansbridge sort]3528-his sort without discovering its secrets to [them]3797-people , for [they]3797-people wanted everything down in black and white , and black and white was exactly what [they]3797-people were left with . [They]3797-people questioned [her]245-helen closely about [Charles]249-charles . [She]245-helen never suspected why . Death had come , and [the doctor]3703-the doctor agreed that it was due to heart disease . [They]3797-people asked to see [[her]245-helen father]3860-her father 's sword . [She]245-helen explained that [Charles]249-charles 's anger was natural , but mistaken . Miserable questions about [Leonard]308-leonard followed , all of which [she]245-helen answered unfalteringly . Then back to [Charles]249-charles again . " No doubt [Mr. Wilcox]249-charles may have induced death , "[245-helen] [she]245-helen said ; " but if it was n't one thing it would have been another , as [you]5991-you [yourselves]5991-you know . "[245-helen] At last [they]3797-people thanked [her]245-helen , and took the sword and the body down to [Hilton]29-hilton . [She]245-helen began to pick up the books from the floor . [Helen]245-helen had gone to [the farm]586-the farm . It was the best place for [her]245-helen , since [she]245-helen had to wait for the inquest . Though , as if things were not hard enough , [Madge]246-margaret and [[her]246-margaret husband]4099-her husband had raised trouble ; [they]3797-people did not see why [they]3797-people should receive the offscourings of [Howards End]339-margaret . And , of course , [they]3797-people were right . [The whole world]4048-the whole world was going to be right , and amply avenge any brave talk against the conventions . " Nothing matters , "[261-the schlegels] [the Schlegels]261-the schlegels had said in the past , " except [one]559-one 's self - respect and that of [one 's friends]5993-one 's friends . "[261-the schlegels] When the time came , other things mattered terribly . However , [Madge]246-margaret had yielded , and [Helen]245-helen was assured of peace for one day and night , and tomorrow [she]245-helen would return to [Germany]3-germany . As for [herself]245-helen , [she]245-helen determined to go too . No message came from [Henry]349-henry ; perhaps [he]349-henry expected [her]245-helen to apologize . Now that [she]245-helen had time to think over [her]245-helen own tragedy , [she]245-helen was unrepentant . [She]245-helen neither forgave [him]349-henry for [his]349-henry behaviour nor wished to forgive [him]349-henry . [Her]245-helen speech to [him]349-henry seemed perfect . [She]245-helen would not have altered a word . It had to be uttered once in a life , to adjust the lopsidedness of [the world]805-the world . It was spoken not only to [[her]245-helen husband]4099-her husband , but to [thousands of men like [him]349-henry]3536-thousands of men like him — a protest against the inner darkness in high places that comes with a commercial age . Though [he]349-henry would build up [his]349-henry life without [hers]245-helen , [she]245-helen could not apologize . [He]349-henry had refused to connect , on the clearest issue that can be laid before [a man]3695-a man , and [their]3538-their love must take the consequences . No , there was nothing more to be done . [They]3538-their had tried not to go over the precipice but perhaps the fall was inevitable . And it comforted [her]245-helen to think that the future was certainly inevitable : cause and effect would go jangling forward to some goal doubtless , but to none that [she]245-helen could imagine . At such moments the soul retires within , to float upon the bosom of [a deeper stream]3539-a deeper stream , and has communion with [the dead]1336-the dead , and sees [the world]805-the world 's glory not diminished , but different in kind to what [she]245-helen has supposed . [She]245-helen alters [her]245-helen focus until trivial things are blurred . [Margaret]246-margaret had been tending this way all the winter . [Leonard]308-leonard 's death brought [her]246-margaret to the goal . Alas ! that [Henry]349-henry should fade , away as reality emerged , and only [her]245-helen love for [him]349-henry should remain clear , stamped with [his]349-henry image like the cameos [we]3542-we rescue out of dreams . With unfaltering eye [she]245-helen traced [his]349-henry future . [He]349-henry would soon present a healthy mind to [the world]805-the world again , and what did [he]349-henry or [the world]805-the world care if [he]349-henry was rotten at the core ? [He]349-henry would grow into [a rich , jolly old man]3545-a rich , jolly old man , at times a little sentimental about [women]596-women , but emptying [his]349-henry glass with [anyone]3964-anyone . Tenacious of power , [he]349-henry would keep [Charles]249-charles and [the rest]1041-the rest dependent , and retire from business reluctantly and at an advanced age . [He]349-henry would settle down — though [she]245-helen could not realize this . In [her]245-helen eyes [Henry]349-henry was always moving and causing [others]3837-others to move , until the ends of [the earth]4343-the earth met . But in time [he]349-henry must get too tired to move , and settle down . What next ? The inevitable word . The release of the soul to [its appropriate Heaven]3551-its appropriate heaven . Would [they]3552-they meet in it ? [Margaret]246-margaret believed in immortality for [herself]246-margaret . An eternal future had always seemed natural to [her]246-margaret . And [Henry]349-henry believed in it for [himself]349-henry . Yet , would [they]3552-they meet again ? Are there not rather endless levels beyond the grave , as the theory that [he]349-henry had censured teaches ? And [his]349-henry level , whether higher or lower , could it possibly be the same as [hers]245-helen ? Thus gravely meditating , [she]245-helen was summoned by [him]349-henry . [He]349-henry sent up [Crane]357-crane in [the motor]771-the motor . [Other servants]3554-other servants passed like water , but [the chauffeur]1367-the chauffeur remained , though impertinent and disloyal . [Margaret]246-margaret disliked [Crane]357-crane , and [he]349-henry knew it . " Is it the keys that [Mr. Wilcox]249-charles wants ? "[246-margaret] [she]246-margaret asked . " [He]249-charles did n't say , [madam]4053-madam . "[246-margaret] " [You]4053-madam have n't any note for [me]245-helen ? "[245-helen] " [He]249-charles did n't say , [madam]4053-madam . "[245-helen] After a moment 's thought [she]245-helen locked up [Howards End]339-margaret . It was pitiable to see in it the stirrings of warmth that would be quenched for ever . [She]245-helen raked out the fire that was blazing in [the kitchen]983-the kitchen , and spread the coals in [the gravelled yard]3557-the gravelled yard . [She]245-helen closed the windows and drew the curtains . [Henry]349-henry would probably sell [the place]2298-the place now . [She]245-helen was determined not to spare [him]349-henry , for nothing new had happened as far as [they]3559-they were concerned . [Her]245-helen mood might never have altered from yesterday evening . [He]349-henry was standing a little outside [[Charles]249-charles 's gate]3560-charles 's gate , and motioned [the car]1354-the car to stop . When [[his]349-henry wife]4328-his wife got out [he]349-henry said hoarsely : " [I]349-henry prefer to discuss things with [you]245-helen outside . "[349-henry] " It will be more appropriate in [the road]957-the road , [I]246-margaret am afraid , "[246-margaret] said [Margaret]246-margaret . " Did [you]349-henry get [my]349-henry message ? "[349-henry] " What about ? "[349-henry] " [I]349-henry am going to [Germany]3-germany with [[my]349-henry sister]860-my sister . [I]349-henry must tell [you]245-helen now that [I]349-henry shall make it [[my]349-henry permanent [home]3928-home]5998-my permanent home . "[349-henry] " [I]349-henry am extremely tired , "[349-henry] said [Henry]349-henry , in injured tones . " [I]349-henry have been walking about all the morning , and wish to sit down . "[349-henry] " Certainly , if [you]245-helen will consent to sit on the grass . "[349-henry] [The Great North Road]701-the great north road should have been bordered all [its]701-the great north road length with glebe . [Henry]349-henry 's kind had filched most of [it]701-the great north road . [She]3564-she moved to the scrap opposite , wherein were [the Six Hills]3565-the six hills . [They]3566-we sat down on the farther side , so that they could not be seen by [Charles]249-charles or [Dolly]336-dolly . " Here are [your]349-henry keys , "[246-margaret] said [Margaret]246-margaret . [She]3564-she tossed them towards [him]349-henry . " [I]3564-she do n't want to hear it , "[3564-she] [she]3564-she replied . " [[My]3564-she sister]860-my sister is going to be ill . [My]3564-she life is going to be with [her]860-my sister now . "[349-henry] " Have [you]246-margaret realized what the verdict at the inquest will be ? "[349-henry] " Yes , heart disease . "[3564-she] " No , [[my]246-margaret dear]623-my dear ; manslaughter . "[246-margaret] [Margaret]246-margaret drove [her]246-margaret fingers through the grass . [The hill beneath [her]3564-she]3568-the hill beneath her moved as if it was alive . " Manslaughter , "[249-charles] repeated [Mr. Wilcox]249-charles . " [Charles]249-charles may go to [prison]6004-prison . [I]249-charles dare not tell [him]249-charles . [I]249-charles do n't know what to do — what to do . [I]249-charles 'm broken — [I'm]249-charles ended . "[249-charles] No sudden warmth arose in [her]246-margaret . [She]246-margaret did not see that to break [him]3569-him was [her]246-margaret only hope . [She]246-margaret did not enfold [the sufferer]3570-the sufferer in [her]246-margaret arms . But all through that day and the next a new life began to move . The verdict was brought in . [Charles]249-charles was committed for trial . It was against all reason that [he]249-charles should be punished , but the law , being made in [his]249-charles image , sentenced [him]249-charles to three years ' imprisonment . Then [[Henry]349-henry 's fortress]3571-henry 's fortress gave way . [He]349-henry could bear [no one]693-no one but [[his]349-henry wife]4328-his wife , [he]349-henry shambled up to [Margaret]246-margaret afterwards and asked [her]246-margaret to do what [she]246-margaret could with [him]349-henry . [She]246-margaret did what seemed easiest — [she]246-margaret took [him]349-henry down to recruit at [Howards End]339-margaret . [[Tom]453-tom 's father]3574-tom 's father was cutting [the big meadow]3575-the big meadow . [He]349-henry passed again and again amid whirring blades and sweet odours of grass , encompassing with narrowing circles the sacred centre of [the field]3576-the field . [Tom]453-tom was negotiating with [Helen]245-helen . " [I]245-helen have n't any idea , "[245-helen] [she]245-helen replied . " Do [you]246-margaret suppose [baby]1302-baby may , [Meg]246-margaret ? " [Tom]453-tom wants to know whether [baby]1302-baby is old enough to play with hay ? "[246-margaret] " [I]246-margaret have n't the least notion , "[246-margaret] answered [Margaret]246-margaret , and took up [her]246-margaret work again . " Now , [Tom]453-tom , [baby]1302-baby is not to stand ; [he]1302-baby is not to lie on [his]1302-baby face ; [he]1302-baby is not to lie so that [his]1302-baby head wags ; [he]1302-baby is not to be teased or tickled ; and [he]1302-baby is not to be cut into two or more pieces by [the cutter]6008-the cutter . That 's why [he]1302-baby does it ! "[245-helen] was [Helen]245-helen 's answer . [They]3578-they 're going to be [lifelong friends]3579-lifelong friends . " "[3579-lifelong friends] Starting at the ages of six and one ? " "[3579-lifelong friends] Of course . It will be a great thing for [Tom]453-tom . " "[453-tom] It may be a greater thing for [baby]1302-baby . " Fourteen months had passed , but [Margaret]246-margaret still stopped at [Howards End]339-margaret . No better plan had occurred to [her]246-margaret . [The meadow]580-the meadow was being recut , the great red poppies were reopening in [the garden]562-the garden . July would follow with the little red poppies among the wheat , August with the cutting of the wheat . These little events would become part of [her]246-margaret year after year . Every summer [she]246-margaret would fear lest the well should give out , every winter lest the pipes should freeze ; every westerly gale might blow the wych - elm down and bring the end of all things , and so [she]246-margaret could not read or talk during a westerly gale . The air was tranquil now . [She]246-margaret and [[her]246-margaret sister]545-her sister were sitting on the remains of [Evie]253-evie 's mockery , where [the lawn]579-the lawn merged into [the field]3576-the field . "[1302-baby] What a time [they]3578-they all are ! " said [Helen]245-helen . "[1302-baby] What can [they]3578-they be doing inside ? " [Margaret]246-margaret , who was growing less talkative , made no answer . The noise of the cutter came intermittently , like the breaking of waves . Close by [them]3578-they [a man]3695-a man was preparing to scythe out one of the dell - holes . "[1302-baby] [I]0-i wish [Henry]349-henry was out to enjoy this , " said [Helen]245-helen . "[349-henry] This lovely weather and to be shut up in [the house]558-the house ! It 's very hard . " "[246-margaret] It has to be , " said [Margaret]246-margaret . [I]0-i like [Henry]349-henry . " "[0-i] [You]0-i 'd be odd if [you]0-i did n't , " said [Margaret]246-margaret . "[0-i] [I]0-i usen't to . " "[0-i] Usen't ! " [She]246-margaret lowered [her]246-margaret eyes a moment to the black abyss of the past . [They]3584-them had crossed it , always excepting [Leonard]308-leonard and [Charles]249-charles . [One usen't]6019-one usen't always to see clearly before that time . It was different now . "[0-i] [I]0-i like [Henry]349-henry because [he]349-henry does worry . " "[349-henry] And [he]349-henry likes [you]0-i because [you]0-i do n't . " [Helen]245-helen sighed . [She]245-helen seemed humiliated , and buried [her]245-helen face in [her]245-helen hands . After a time [she]245-helen said : "[349-henry] Above love , " a transition less abrupt than it appeared . [Margaret]246-margaret never stopped working . "[0-i] [I]0-i mean [a woman]1002-a woman 's love for [a man]3695-a man . [I]0-i supposed [I]0-i should hang [my]0-i life on to that once , and was driven up and down and about as if something was worrying through [me]0-i . But everything is peaceful now ; [I]0-i seem cured . That Herr Förstmeister , whom [Frieda]326-frieda keeps writing about , must be [a noble character]3587-a noble character , but [he]349-henry does n't see that [I]0-i shall never marry [him]349-henry or [anyone]3964-anyone . Do [you]0-i agree ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i do not agree . [I]0-i do not . " [Her]5723-my darling eyes filled with tears . "[0-i] How nothing seems to match — how , [[my]0-i darling]5723-my darling , [[my]0-i precious]3593-my precious — " [She]5723-my darling broke off . "[453-tom] [Tommy]453-tom ! " "[453-tom] Yes , please ? " "[1302-baby] [Baby]1302-baby 's not to try and stand.—There 's something wanting in [me]0-i . [She]246-margaret said : "[0-i] It is only that [people]3797-people are far more different than is pretended . All over [the world]805-the world [men]597-men and [women]596-women are worrying because [they]3599-they can not develop as [they]3599-they are supposed to develop . Here and there [they]3599-they have the matter out , and it comforts [them]3599-they . Do n't fret [yourself]5723-my darling , [Helen]245-helen . Do n't [you]5723-my darling see that all this leads to comfort in the end ? It is part of the battle against sameness . Then [I]0-i ca n't have [you]5723-my darling worrying about [Leonard]308-leonard . Do n't drag in the personal when it will not come . Forget [him]308-leonard . " "[281-god] Yes , yes , but what has [Leonard]308-leonard got out of life ? " "[308-leonard] Perhaps an adventure . " "[308-leonard] Is that enough ? " "[308-leonard] Not for [us]3607-us . "[246-margaret] [You]246-margaret ! " cried [Helen]245-helen . "[246-margaret] [You]246-margaret did it all , sweetest , though [you]246-margaret 're too stupid to see . Living [here]575-here was [your]246-margaret plan — [I]0-i wanted [you]246-margaret ; [he]349-henry wanted [you]246-margaret ; and [every one]1304-every one said it was impossible , but [you]246-margaret knew . " "[0-i] [I]0-i hope it will be permanent , " said [Helen]245-helen , drifting away to other thoughts . "[0-i] [I]0-i think so . There are moments when [I]0-i feel [Howards End]339-margaret peculiarly [our]3617-our own . " "[0-i] All the same , [[London]2-london 's creeping]3618-london 's creeping . " [She]245-helen pointed over [the meadow]580-the meadow — over [eight or nine meadows]6022-eight or nine meadows , but at the end of them was a red rust . " [Margaret]246-margaret knew that [[her]246-margaret sister]545-her sister spoke truly . Logically , [they]3623-they had no right to be alive . One 's hope was in the weakness of logic . Were [they]3623-they possibly [the earth]4343-the earth beating time ? "[0-i] Because a thing is going strong now , it need not go strong for ever , " [she]545-her sister said . "[0-i] This craze for motion has only set in during the last hundred years . It may be followed by a civilization that wo n't be a movement , because it will rest on [the earth]4343-the earth . All the signs are against it now , but [I]0-i ca n't help hoping , and very early in the morning in [the garden]562-the garden [I]0-i feel that [[our]3623-they house]4007-our house is the future as well as the past . " [They]3623-they turned and looked at [it]4007-our house . [Their]3623-they own memories coloured it now , for [[Helen]245-helen 's child]6025-helen 's child had been born in [the central room of the nine]6026-the central room of the nine . "[3625-the conclave] [The conclave]3625-the conclave 's breaking at last . [I]0-i 'll go . " It was [Paul]247-paul . [Helen]245-helen retreated with [the children]6028-the children far into [the field]3576-the field . Friendly voices greeted [her]246-margaret . [Margaret]246-margaret rose , to encounter [a man with a heavy black moustache]6030-a man with a heavy black moustache . "[0-i] [[My]0-i father]3721-my father has asked for [you]0-i , " [he]0-i said with hostility . [She]246-margaret took [her]246-margaret work and followed [him]0-i . "[3721-my father] [We]3627-we have been talking business , " [he]0-i continued , "[3627-we] but [I]0-i dare say [you]0-i knew all about it beforehand . " "[0-i] Yes , [I]0-i did . " Clumsy of movement — for [he]0-i had spent all [his]0-i life in the saddle — [Paul]247-paul drove [his]0-i foot against the paint of the front door . [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox gave a little cry of annoyance . [She]510-mrs. wilcox did not like anything scratched ; [she]510-mrs. wilcox stopped in [the hall]907-the hall to take [Dolly]336-dolly 's boa and gloves out of a vase . [[Her]510-mrs. wilcox husband]4099-her husband was lying in a great leather chair in [the dining - room]3782-the dining - room , and by [his]4099-her husband side , holding [his]4099-her husband hand rather ostentatiously , was [Evie]253-evie . [Dolly]336-dolly , dressed in purple , sat near the window . [The room]1059-the room was a little dark and airless ; [they]6035-they were obliged to keep it like this until the carting of the hay . [Margaret]246-margaret joined [the family]4082-the family without speaking ; [the five of [them]4082-the family]6037-the five of them had met already at tea , and [she]246-margaret knew quite well what was going to be said . Averse to wasting [her]246-margaret time , [she]246-margaret went on sewing . The clock struck six . "[0-i] Is this going to suit [every one]1304-every one ? " said [Henry]349-henry in a weary voice . [He]0-i used the old phrases , but their effect was unexpected and shadowy . "[0-i] Because [I]0-i do n't want [you]3629-you all coming [here]575-here later on and complaining that [I]0-i have been unfair . " "[0-i] It 's apparently got to suit [us]3631-us , " said [Paul]247-paul . "[0-i] [I]0-i beg [your]3629-you pardon , [[my]0-i boy]4147-my boy . [You]3629-you have only to speak , and [I]0-i will leave [the house]558-the house to [you]3629-you instead . " [Paul]247-paul frowned ill - temperedly , and began scratching at [his]247-paul arm . " There was a general silence . [Dolly]336-dolly looked nervously round , fearing that [she]336-dolly had been inappropriate . [Paul]247-paul continued to scratch [his]247-paul arm . "[0-i] Then [I]0-i leave [Howards End]339-margaret to [[my]0-i wife]4044-my wife absolutely , " said [Henry]349-henry . "[0-i] And let [every one]1304-every one understand that ; and after [I]0-i am dead let there be no jealousy and no surprise . " [Margaret]246-margaret did not answer . There was something uncanny in [her]246-margaret triumph . [She]246-margaret , who had never expected to conquer [anyone]3964-anyone , had charged straight through [these Wilcoxes]632-these wilcoxes and broken up [their]632-these wilcoxes lives . "[0-i] In consequence , [I]0-i leave [[my]0-i wife]4044-my wife no money , " said [Henry]349-henry . "[0-i] That is [her]4044-my wife own wish . All that [she]4044-my wife would have had will be divided among [you]3644-you . [I]0-i am also giving [you]3644-you a great deal in [my]0-i lifetime , so that [you]3644-you may be independent of [me]0-i . That is [her]4044-my wife wish , too . [She]4044-my wife also is giving away a great deal of money . [She]4044-my wife intends to diminish [her]4044-my wife income by half during the next ten years ; [she]4044-my wife intends when [she]4044-my wife dies to leave [the house]558-the house to [her]4044-my wife — to [[her]4044-my wife nephew]3962-her nephew , down in [the field]3576-the field . Is all that clear ? Does [every one]1304-every one understand ? " [Paul]247-paul rose to [his]247-paul feet . [He]247-paul was accustomed to [natives]6040-natives , and a very little shook [him]247-paul out of [the Englishman]6041-the englishman . " [Mrs. Cahill]544-mrs. cahill whispered : "[0-i] Do n't , [Paul]247-paul . [You]247-paul promised [you]247-paul 'd take care . " Feeling [a woman of [the world]805-the world]6042-a woman of the world , [she]3653-old girl rose and prepared to take [her]3653-old girl leave . [[Her]3653-old girl father]3860-her father kissed [her]3653-old girl . " Then it was [Dolly]336-dolly 's turn . Anxious to contribute , [she]3653-old girl laughed nervously , and said : "[454-dad] Good - bye , [Mr. Wilcox]249-charles . It does seem curious that [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox should have left [Margaret Howards End]339-margaret , and yet [she]510-mrs. wilcox get it , after all . " From [Evie]253-evie came a sharply - drawn breath . "[510-mrs. wilcox] Good - bye , " [she]3653-old girl said to [Margaret]339-margaret , and kissed [her]339-margaret . And again and again fell the word , like the ebb of a dying sea . "[510-mrs. wilcox] Good - bye . " "[510-mrs. wilcox] Good - bye , [Dolly]336-dolly . " "[336-dolly] So long , [Father]348-father . [Margaret]339-margaret saw [[their]3655-their visitors]3656-their visitors to the gate . Then [she]339-margaret returned to [[her]339-margaret husband]4099-her husband and laid [her]339-margaret head in [his]4099-her husband hands . [He]4099-her husband was pitiably tired . But [Dolly]336-dolly 's remark had interested [her]339-margaret . At last [she]339-margaret said : " Could [you]4099-her husband tell [me]339-margaret , [Henry]349-henry , what was that about [Mrs. Wilcox]510-mrs. wilcox having left [me]339-margaret [Howards End]339-margaret ? "[339-margaret] Tranquilly [he]4099-her husband replied : " Yes , [she]510-mrs. wilcox did . But that is a very old story . When [she]510-mrs. wilcox was ill and [you]339-margaret were so kind to [her]510-mrs. wilcox [she]510-mrs. wilcox wanted to make [you]339-margaret some return , and , not being [herself]510-mrs. wilcox at the time , scribbled ' Howards End ' on a piece of paper . [I]4099-her husband went into it thoroughly , and , as it was clearly fanciful , [I]4099-her husband set it aside , little knowing what [[my]4099-her husband Margaret]5844-my margaret would be to [me]4099-her husband in the future . "[4099-her husband] [Margaret]339-margaret was silent . Something shook [her]339-margaret life in its inmost recesses , and [she]339-margaret shivered . " [I]4099-her husband did n't do wrong , did [I]4099-her husband ? "[4099-her husband] [he]4099-her husband asked , bending down . " [You]339-margaret did n't , [darling]5898-darling . Nothing has been done wrong . "[4099-her husband] From [the garden]562-the garden came laughter . " Here [they]6047-they are at last ! [Helen]245-helen rushed into the gloom , holding [Tom]453-tom by one hand and carrying [[her]245-helen baby]3659-her baby on the other . There were shouts of infectious joy . " [The field]3576-the field 's cut ! "[245-helen] [Helen]245-helen cried excitedly—"the big meadow ! [We]6049-we 've seen to the very end , and it 'll be such a crop of hay as never ! "[245-helen]
